title: The Gay Travel Guide for Tops and Bottoms
description: The Gay Travel Guide For Tops And Bottoms USA Edition is a new way to look at travel. Our special travel duo of gay men set out across the USA to find the best places for gay tops and bottoms to travel for their future adventures. Find out which state has MORE TOPS THAN BOTTOMS! Find out which state has the best power bottoms! The Gay Travel Guide For Tops And Bottoms - Our motto is: Never leave your best friend's behind! This book is a must have to the anal minded traveler in search of romance, adventure, and a lot of fun!
author: Drew Blancs
